desc: Wiimote Classic Controller on Mac with WJoy Driver v0.7.1.

buttons._note_wiitmote: Mappings assume Wiimote is held vertically like a TV remote.

axes._note_format: X axes are described in the following format: 'Axis Name: min-value,max-value.
axes._note_sticks: Using the format described on the horizontal axis, min-value corresponds with left, max-value with right. On the vertical axis, min-value with up, max-value with down.
axes._note_triggers: Using the format described with triggers, min-value corresponds with the trigger being fully released (not pressed at all) and max-value with the trigger fully pressed.
axes._special_trigger_note: Left and right triggers correspond with the L and R buttons.
